home.title: Home - FLAKOS Hostel
home.description: Discover FLAKOS Hostel on Playa Blanca, where nature, surf, and shelter dogs come together. Enjoy a relaxing stay near the beach with affordable accommodations and unforgettable experiences.
home.keywords: Hostel, Playa Blanca, Zihuatanejo, surf, nature, dogs, lodging, experiences

rooms.title: Rooms - FLAKOS Hostel
rooms.description: Explore our bungalows and glamping tents at FLAKOS Hostel. Enjoy a peaceful retreat near the ocean, with rustic comfort, eco-friendly stays, and a connection to nature.
rooms.keywords: Hostel, Playa Blanca, Zihuatanejo, rooms, affordable lodging, nature

about.title: About Us - FLAKOS Hostel
about.description: Learn more about FLAKOS Hostel, a place where community, nature, and shelter dogs meet. We offer unique stays on Playa Blanca with a mission to make a difference.
about.keywords: Hostel, Playa Blanca, Zihuatanejo, mission, dogs, nature

experiences.title: Experiences - FLAKOS Hostel
experiences.description: Discover exciting activities at FLAKOS Hostel, from surfing and snorkeling to yoga and jungle hikes. Enjoy Playa Blanca’s natural beauty and vibrant adventures.
experiences.keywords: Hostel, Playa Blanca, Zihuatanejo, experiences, nature, surf, snorkeling, dogs

Home.title: Welcome to Flakos Hostel – Your Paradise Awaits
Home.description: Playa Blanca, Guerrero, offers affordable stays in bungalows and glamping. Enjoy the beach, explore nature, and be part of our mission to help shelter dogs.

bungalows.title: Bungalows
bungalows.description: Our bungalows offer a cozy and peaceful retreat just steps from the beach, with rustic decor, comfortable beds, and private bathrooms. Perfect for couples or small families seeking relaxation.

glampings.title: Glampings
glampings.description: Experience nature with comfort in our spacious glamping tents, combining the adventure of camping with the luxury of cozy bedding and modern amenities. Ideal for eco-conscious travelers.

mivi.title: Our Mission and Vision
mivi.Mibody: Hostel Flakos mission is to show our guests the beauty and variety of playa blanca for affordable prices! Our idea is to help the dogs getting more love or even adopted. Also taking care of the puppies of the shelter so guests can play and train them to become good dogs.
mivi.Vibody: Located in the picturesque perfect paradise of Playa Blanca, Guerrero, Mexico, Hostel Flakos is merely 5 minutes from one of the best surf breaks in the area. Excellent free diving, snorkeling, fishing, paddle boarding, whale watching, kayaking, birdwatching, nearby archeological sites and of course beach bumming. The best part of all…the public entrance to the beach is just across the street!

cultural.title: Cultural exchange
cultural.body: Nestled in the heart of Zihuatanejo, Guerrero, Hostal Flakos offers travelers a unique blend of comfort and local charm. With its cozy, colorful rooms and welcoming atmosphere, it’s the perfect spot for those looking to unwind and enjoy the beauty of Mexico's Pacific coast. Just minutes away from pristine beaches, local markets, and vibrant street life, this charming hostal provides the ideal base for exploring the area. Guests can enjoy a relaxing stay with friendly service, delicious local cuisine, and stunning views of the ocean, creating unforgettable memories.

contact.title: ¡Contact Us!
contact.description: We want you to live the experience and beauty that Playa Blanca has for you.

Rooms.title: Rooms
Rooms.topDescription: Explore our rooms and enjoy the beach, nature, and the best of Playa Blanca.
Rooms.bottomDescription: We invite you to relax in our serene spaces, where the ocean breeze and tranquility meet.

price.title: Price Plans
price.description: At FLAKOS Hostel, we offer flexible pricing based on the season and your stay duration. For longer stays or special dates, be sure to ask about our discounted rates. Enjoy the best of Playa Blanca with accommodations tailored to your needs, whether you're here during the peak season or just looking for a quiet escape.

About.topDescription: Discover the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure at Flakos Hostel. Nestled along the serene shores of Playa Blanca, we offer a unique stay combining comfort, nature, and community. Join us in creating memories by the beach while supporting our mission to care for local shelter dogs.
About.bottomDescription: From cozy bungalows to eco-friendly glamping, Flakos Hostel provides a diverse range of accommodations. Whether you're here to surf, explore, or unwind, our beachfront location and commitment to sustainability will make your stay unforgettable.

Experiences.topDescription: Explore a variety of activities at Flakos Hostel through our photo gallery. Whether it's surfing, yoga, or sunset walks on Playa Blanca, there's something for everyone. Dive into the adventure, relax by the ocean, and enjoy all that our hostel and surroundings have to offer.
Experiences.bottomDescription: From morning surf sessions to evening bonfires, our gallery captures the spirit of Flakos Hostel. Take a look at the unforgettable moments and experiences you can be part of during your stay.

Content.title: Swimming
Content.desc: Enjoy a refreshing swim in the crystal-clear waters of the Pacific Ocean. Whether you're an expert swimmer or just looking to cool off, our beach offers the perfect spot to relax and enjoy the sea.

Content.title: Surfing
Content.desc: Catch the perfect wave at one of the most popular surf spots on the Oaxacan coast. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, you'll find the right conditions to ride the waves and improve your skills.

Content.title: Snorkeling
Content.desc: Explore the underwater world with snorkeling. Discover vibrant coral reefs, tropical fish, and other marine life just a few steps from the shore.

Content.title: Yoga on the Beach
Content.desc: Start your day with a calming yoga session on the beach. With the sound of the waves and the ocean breeze, it's the perfect way to reconnect with yourself and nature.

Content.title: Beach Volleyball
Content.desc: Join a friendly game of beach volleyball with other guests. It's a great way to have fun, stay active, and make new friends during your stay.

Content.title: Fishing
Content.desc: Experience traditional fishing along the Oaxacan coast. Our local guides will show you the best spots and techniques to catch fish like a pro.

Content.title: Sunset Watching
Content.desc: Witness breathtaking sunsets every evening from our beach. As the sky turns vibrant shades of red, orange, and pink, it's a moment you won't want to miss.

Content.title: Hiking in the Jungle
Content.desc: Venture into the lush jungle near our hostel. With guided tours, you'll explore hidden waterfalls, spot exotic wildlife, and discover the natural beauty of Oaxaca.

home.intro: Welcome to FLAKOS Hostel, your ideal escape on Playa Blanca. Nestled along the Pacific coast of Guerrero, our hostel offers a unique blend of adventure, relaxation, and community. Whether you're looking to surf the waves, explore the lush surroundings, or just enjoy the company of shelter dogs, FLAKOS has something special for everyone.

about.intro: At FLAKOS Hostel, we believe in creating meaningful experiences that connect travelers with nature, local culture, and community. Our mission goes beyond providing accommodation—we aim to foster a positive impact by supporting local dog shelters and encouraging sustainable tourism. Discover how our values shape the heart of everything we do.

rooms.intro: Discover the perfect room for your stay at FLAKOS Hostel. Choose between rustic bungalows with private amenities or eco-friendly glamping tents that immerse you in nature. Whether you’re traveling solo, as a couple, or with family, our accommodations offer the ideal setting for rest, comfort, and adventure just steps away from the beach.

experiences.intro: Immerse yourself in unforgettable experiences at FLAKOS Hostel. From sunrise yoga sessions on the beach to surf lessons and guided jungle hikes, we offer a range of activities that connect you with the natural beauty of Playa Blanca. Relax by the ocean, explore vibrant marine life, or simply unwind with our shelter dogs for an experience unlike any other.
